channel.title: Machine Learning on Cairo NLP
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Cairo NLP

item.title: Arabic Sentiment Analysis: Challenges and Solutions
item.author: cairo.nlp.group@gmail.com (cAIro|NLP Group)
item.description: Abstract This talk explores the unique challenges of sentiment analysis in Arabic text, including dialectal variations, morphological complexity, and limited labeled datasets. Speaker Bio Dr. Ahmed Mohamed is a professor of computational linguistics at Cairo University with 10 years of experience in Arabic NLP. Slides Download slides Recording Watch recording
